author: richard_orareo
post: If your mindset is to demonstrate a fraud, then it is necessary to stretch, fold and otherwise manipulate time and space to make the cloth fit your mindset. Reverse your logic; the sculptor used the shroud as a model for his sarcophagus. There is no need to manipulate time, space, or the cloth. The artist simply copied the image to his sculpture..
